judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schafeer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The questions involved in this appeal are fully and correctly disposed of in the opinion of the court below by Judge Gest. The decree is affirmed on that opinion.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: E. Waring Wilson, with him Marry J. Alicer, Jr., for appellant.
Joseph Carson and R. M. Remide, with them Charles C. Perleins, for appellee.
William E. Mikell, Jr., and R. M. Remiek, of Saul, Ewing, Remiek & Saul, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Handy’s Estate.
Argued January 3, 1934.
Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schafeer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
E. Waring Wilson, with him Marry J. Alicer, Jr., for appellant.
Joseph Carson and R. M. Remide, with them Charles C. Perleins, for appellee.
William E. Mikell, Jr., and R. M. Remiek, of Saul, Ewing, Remiek & Saul, for appellees.
January 30, 1934:
